1. L0x6F0x6Fk0x69ng 0x61t th0x65 m0x6Fn0x69t0x6Fr f0x6Fr 0x61 l0x6Fng t0x69m0x65

12. D0x75st

0x49t's n0x6Ft 0x61 v0x65r0x79 pl0x650x61s0x61nt p0x69c
